title: CFW 4.46 CEX by HABIB - PS3 STABLE
description:
This is a most recent update to Habibs' new Custom Firmware which I have currently tested on 5 different consoles and counting and is working flawless. 

Note: you can go online but at your own risk. I left 3 consoles online since his first public release and so far no ban but use at your own risk. 

I have no installed in from anythingn but 3.55 Kmeaw. 

Warning! -- I strongly advice to enable QA toggle and go into settings and enable update debug.

Warning! -- I would also install rogeros' downgradger also if you haven't already. 

Here are the steps to Install Qa flag and rogeros downgrader pup. 

STEP ONE

1: Install toggle_qa.pkg
2: Run Toggle QA from XMB
3: PS3 will beep and return to XMB. (If you do not hear a beep it has not worked)

NOTE: Every now and then it will hang on the lv1 patching stage. If it has not beeped and returned to the XMB after about 30secs you will need to reboot and try again. (TO CHECK THAT IT HAS BEEN ENABLED IS IMPORTANT! GO TO NETWORK SETTINGS FROM THE XMB AND DON'T CLICK IT. INSTEAD HOVER THERE AND PRESS PRESS L2+L1+L3+R1+R2+DOWN ON THE DPAD. 

I can't stress how important this is because after you press that combination the menu will expand and give you access to debug settings which you will find system update debud that you need to turn on. 

STEP TWO

Then makE a directory on your usb flash that looks like this

 PS3/UPDATE/PS3UPDAT.PUP

rename the rogero downgrader pup I have included to PS3UPDAT.PUP and put it in the UPDATE folder. 

go to system update from the xmb and update via storage media

now your ps3 will install and reboot into rogero but v9.99

STEP THREE 


ON YOUR USB FLASH DRIVE IN DIRECTORY PS3/UPDATE/PS3UPDAT.PUP

REINSTALL KMEAW 3.55 CFW 


STEP FOUR

Rename habib113PS3UPDAT.PUP to PS3UPDAT.PUP AND Replace the PS3UPDAT.PUP in your flash drives directory PS3/UPDATE/PS3UPDAT.PUP
now you can install HABIBS' CFW 4.46 CEX through the xmb using the system update

make sure you chose from recovery media and let it install 


Confirmed working for me are PS1 PS2 the newest Reactpsn 2.26 along with psn stuff

You must use Multiman V 4.46 + to support this CFW

All thanks go to HABIB and all his friends that helped him create this CFW. 

(You must install from Kmeaw 3.55 CFW to avoid problems and you must reinstall Kmeaw 3.55 after you install rogeros downgrader before you install habibs' 4.46 CFW)

Good Luck and Enjoy
